TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `CommandName` 单击控件中 ) 属性设置为 "delete" 的按钮 (时，控件将引发事件，但在控件删除记录后，控件将引发该按钮 。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在此事件发生时检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受删除操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在删除操作过程中发生了异常，并且 属性设置为 `false` ，则 控件将重新引发异常。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 如果要访问已删除记录的键字段和非键字段的名称/值对，请 分别使用和 属性。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件的事件处理方法的对象 来确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `e` 。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false` 。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定受删除操作影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the delete operation. 此属性通常用于验证是否在下列情况下删除了正确的记录数：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was deleted in the following situations: - 验证是否只删除了单个记录。Verify that only a single record was deleted. 有时，错误编写的 delete 语句可以删除多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written delete statement can delete multiple records. - 当在不引发异常的删除操作过程中发生错误时，验证是否已删除记录。Verify that a record was deleted when an error occurs during the delete operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证在支持冲突检测的数据源控件 (乐观并发) （如和控件）的数据源控件 将其属性设置为 `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` 枚举值时，已删除记录。Verify that a record was deleted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下，其他用户同时修改的记录可能不会被删除。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来验证是否已在执行删除操作期间删除记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 删除操作过程中引发的任何) ，请使用属性来确定异常 (。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请确保将 属性设置为 `true` ; 否则， 控件将重新引发异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定在删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在删除操作过程中引发了异常，则使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则异常被视为已处理并且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则 控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取已删除记录的键字段名/值对的排序字典。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含已删除记录所对应的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: An that contains key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含控件的属性中列出的键字段的值 。The property contains the values of the key fields listed in the property of a control. 使用 属性访问 已删除记录的属性) 指定 (的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅包含在属性中指定的键字段 。This property contains only the key fields specified in the property. 若要访问非键字段，请使用 属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回 实现接口的对象 。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示已删除记录的键字段。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted record. 若要访问字段名称，请使用 对象的属性 。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，可以使用属性访问字段值 。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 访问键字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the key field values. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回键字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如 ) 只能通过索引访问键字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access key field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/formviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/formviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已删除记录所对应的非键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 一个含有字典的 对象，其中包含已删除记录所对应的非键字段名称/值对。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已删除记录的非键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 仅当在项模板中使用双向绑定表达式时，才填充属性。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the item template. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). 属性返回 实现接口的对象 。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示已删除记录的非键字段。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted record. 若要访问字段名称，请使用 对象的属性 。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，可以使用属性访问字段值 。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 来访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如 ) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. 此属性不包含由 已删除记录的属性) 指定 (的键字段。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted record. 若要访问密钥字段，请使用 属性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的非键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/formviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/formviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]
